sentences: Päikeseloojang ja päikesetõus näitavad ida ja lääne suuna.
context: The Estonian word 'ida' means 'east' and refers to the eastern direction or cardinal point. It is used to describe geographical orientation, directions on a compass, or anything related to the east side of something. In Estonian grammar, it's typically in nominative case when referring to the general concept of 'east'. The word can also be found in compounds like 'idapoolne' (eastern) to indicate directionality.
